s.text: Mitchell, currently with NPR and the Fort Worth Star-Telegram , has the perfect sensibility for writing about a steady profusion of disaster movies and romantic comedies.
And his rap empire is a great success story of capitalism.
And his rap empire is a great success story of capitalism.
And his rap empire is a great success story of capitalism.
(If Notorious had lived, perhaps their partnership would have flourished into the rap equivalent of the Miles Davis-Gil Evans relationship.)
